title: Why you should opt for embedded system?
content: The entire future technologies will be based on embedded and it is good if someone start practising embedded system from now itself.

title: What is the meaning of embedded system?
content: When many components are embedded on a single chip and used for several specific purposes then it is termed as a part of embedded system.

title: What are the basic applications that can be useful to the students learning embedded system?
content: It has many applications, some of them are:
listItems: Making your home appliances fully automated.

title: How to attend workshop?
listItems: Go to the website followed by www.teckat.com
Go to the contact page and submit your query.
Once we get your response, we will contact you soon.

title: Will you be trained in the workshop?
content: Yes, you will be trained with all the equipment required for the workshop.

title: What are the different workshops that we conduct?
content: We conduct workshop on Embedded System (Arduino, Node Mcu, Raspberry Pi), Web Development(HTML, CSS, PHP,JavaScript), App Development,etc….

title: Do you need any pre-knowledge before attending the workshop?
content: Pre-knowledge of any programming language is not at all required because we always start from scratch.

title: How to pay the amount during registration of any of the workshops?
content: You need to pay amount either by online or in the given centre before the last date of registration.For further details visit www.teckat.com .

title: Are such practical knowledge useful to engineer?
content: The projects that an engineer should do and which will help them in their future jobs can be implemented only by this type of practical knowledge.

title: What will be the place of attending the workshop?
content: The workshop will be conducted either in your respected school/college or in a specific centre of your city/town.

title: For how many days workshops will be conducted?
content: Workshops are usually conducted for 1-2 days depending upon the type of workshop.

title: How to contact you for any queries?
listItems: Go to the website followed by www.teckat.com
Go to the contact page and submit your query.
Once we get your response, we will contact you soon.

title: What will be the equipment’s given during the workshop?
content: All equipment’s that are required for the workshop will be provided to you.

title: What will be the overall cost of the workshop?
content: The cost of the workshop depends upon the type of workshop conducted. Usually, the amount ranges from Rs. 300 to Rs. 1000 per head.

title: Whether the equipment’s will be given individually or in a group?
content: The choice of group or individuality is totally your`s

title: How can we buy the equipment’s?
content: For any equipment you can directly contact us or mail us your requirements at support@teckat.com and after that we will contact you via call soon.

title: Can we take the equipment’s home after the workshop gets completed?
content: It totally depends on which type of workshop you paid for. For any further assistance contact us on www.teckat.com.
